[title] : payment plan
description :
      tmf671 payment plan is a set of payment methods for a specific payment purpose. it defines the payment plan attributes, such as plan name, description, status, status date, and payment frequency. payment plan api performs the following operations on payment plan. - retrieval of a payment plan or a collection of payment plans depending on filter criteria - creation of a payment plan - update of a payment plan - deletion of a payment plan.

copyright Â© tm [...]
endpoints :
    - get /paymentplan
      list or find paymentplan objects
    - post /paymentplan
      creates a paymentplan
    - get /paymentplan/{id}
      retrieves a paymentplan by id
    - delete /paymentplan/{id}
      deletes a paymentplan
    - patch /paymentplan/{id}
      updates partially a paymentplan
    - post /hub
      register a listener
    - delete /hub/{id}
      unregister a listener
    - post /listener/paymentplancreateevent
      client listener for entity paymentplancreateevent
    - post /listener/paymentplanattributevaluechangeevent
      client listener for entity paymentplanattributevaluechangeevent
    - post /listener/paymentplanstatuschangeevent
      client listener for entity paymentplanstatuschangeevent
    - post /listener/paymentplandeleteevent
      client listener for entity paymentplandeleteevent

license-manager payment

[instructions]

* the license manager api allows you to create users, modify their names and emails, and add and remove roles from users.
* the api is used to manage licenses for vtex commerce, a cloud-based commerce platform.
* the api endpoints include get, post, put, delete, and get, and are used to perform various actions such as getting a list of users, creating a new user, updating a user's roles, and removing a role from a user.
* the api uses https and returns json data.
* the api is secured with oauth2, and you must provide a valid access token to access the api.
* the api is rate-limited to prevent excessive use.

[title] : transfer summary api
description :
      api that provides a summary of all transfers that have been made to a particular investment or fund, including the amount, date, and status of the transfer.
endpoints :
    - get /transfersummary
      retrieve a summary of all transfers made to a particular investment or fund.
    - get /transfersummary/{investmentorfundid}
      retrieve a summary of all transfers made to a specific investment or fund.
    - get /transfersummary/{investmentorfundid}/status
      retrieve the status of a specific transfer.

[title] : payment gateway api
description :
      a payment gateway is a service that processes online payments securely. it acts as a bridge between a merchant's website and the payment card networks (such as visa, mastercard, and american express). the payment gateway api allows developers to integrate payment processing into their applications, enabling customers to make payments online. the api supports a wide range of payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets like paypal. the api also provides fraud detection and prevention tools to help protect against unauthorized transactions.

the provided text describes the endpoints and features of cryptoterminal, a platform that provides real-time alerts and headlines related to cryptocurrency. the endpoints include get /alert, get /headline, get /price, and others that allow for filtering by coin, exchange, source, and search string. the platform also provides historical price data for coins listed on major exchanges.

the provided text describes the endpoints and features of the phantauth api, which is a tool for generating random user accounts and providing openid connect authentication. the api includes endpoints for creating and retrieving clients, domains, fleets, teams, tenants, and users, as well as endpoints for generating client and user selfies. additionally, the api provides tokens for clients, users, and teams.

[inst0] title : credibly - loan api
description :
      loan api allows merchants to accept loan offers and close the loan with the partner.
endpoints :
    - post /do
      do prequalify and check eligible offers without submit
    - post /submitapplication
      submit an application for process and get prequalified offers. also takes supporting documents.
    - post /uploaddocuments
      add document to submitted application with loan or preapproval response id
    - get /get
      retrieve prequalified offer details
    - post /loan
      close loan with partner.

the tpp-bank api is used to transfer funds between different bank accounts. the api provides endpoints for initiating transactions, approving transactions, and retrieving account information. the api uses oauth 2.0 for authentication and authorization.

loan

the response to the question "which api should i use for integrating with choose wisely?" is:

* the choose wisely customer api is recommended for integrating with choose wisely.
* the api can be used for multiple use cases, including submitting a customer for a loan comparison and retrieving raw result data.
* the more fields of the api that are populated, the better the chances of the applicant being submitted to all lenders in the panel and achieving better downstream conversion and results.

[title] : bank revenue internet banking
description :
      * service description: service responsible for updating billing information for corporate clients. once updated,
      it will be used in the credit analysis processes by the compliance area. ----- * interface description: service
      responsible for updating customer billing information in the corporate segment. being updated, it is used in the
      credit analysis processes by the compliance area.
endpoints :
    - get /billings:by_token
      service responsible for query segmentation, retecency date e yearly billing last.
    - post /billings/{billing_id}:evaluate
      consultative billings evaluate
    - put /billings/{billing_id}
      effective billing
    - get /billings_monthly
      service responsible for query billings monthly.
    - put /billings_monthly/{billing_monthly_id}
      effective billing monthly
    - post /billings_monthly:batch_evaluate
      consultative billings monthly evaluate
    - get /segments/{segments_id}
      service responsible for bringing company service.
